data.message: What do I have to do?  Just "Like" the page?

replies.message: Hey Eliana. You can get to the World Cup experience on Facebook a few different ways. You can go to http://on.fb.me/1nxjtUh. You can also click/tap on #worldcup, or if you see a friend share the experience or post that they're watching a specific game, you can click/tap on the post. If you're using Facebook on a feature phone, you'll see an icon for the World Cup on your Facebook home screen. Enjoy the games! -Jenny
Jenny, I can't find the FB icon on my home page on my iPhone.  Where exactly should I find it?
